entry.value: # Do pandas inner join%%00010# output_table = input_table_1.join(input_table_2, how='inner', lsuffix=' (left)', rsuffix=' (right)')%%00010%%00010output_table = input_table_2.copy()%%00010baseyear = int(flow_variables['baseyear'])%%00010flow_variables['error'] = []%%00010%%00010# loop through the years%%00010for i in input_table_1['Years'].unique():%%00010 # if the year appears in the index, do the calculation%%00010 if int(i) >= baseyear:%%00010%%00009 mask_year = input_table_1["Years"] == i%%00010%%00009 for country in input_table_1['Country'].unique():%%00010 %%00009%%00009mask_country = input_table_1["Country"] == country%%00010%%00009 %%00009for index, row in input_table_2.iterrows():%%00010 %%00009%%00009%%00009list_columns = row['columns']%%00010 %%00009%%00009%%00009target = row['value']%%00010 %%00009%%00009%%00009value = input_table_1.loc[mask_year&mask_country,list_columns].sum().sum()%%00010 %%00009%%00009%%00009if abs(value) > abs(target)*(1+flow_variables['sensitivity']) or abs(value) < abs(target)*(1-flow_variables['sensitivity']):%%00010%%00009 %%00009%%00009%%00009output_table.loc[index, i + "_" + country] = value%%00010%%00009 %%00009%%00009%%00009if row['data_grouping'] not in flow_variables['error']:%%00010%%00009 %%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009flow_variables['error'].append(row['data_grouping'])
